Feral Charge.name: Feral Charge
descriptions: Causes you to charge an enemy, immobilizing and interrupting any spell being cast for $19675d.

Leap.name: Leap
descriptions: Remove all movement impairing effects and leap forward. The distance you leap is highly dependent on the terrain.

Blood Frenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
descriptions: Your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points  have a 50% chance to add an additional combo point.
Your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points  have a 100% chance to add an additional combo point.

Feline Swiftness.name: Feline Swiftness
descriptions: Increases your movement speed by $24867s1% while outdoors in Cat Form and increases your chance to dodge by 3%.
Increases your movement speed by $24864s1% while outdoors in Cat Form and increases your chance to dodge by 6%.

Primal Fury.name: Primal Fury
descriptions: Gives you a 50% chance to gain an additional $/10;16959s1 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear Form.
Gives you a 100% chance to gain an additional $/10;16959s1 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear Form.

Sharpened Claws.name: Sharpened Claws
descriptions: Increases your critical strike chance while in Bear or Cat Form by 2%.
Increases your critical strike chance while in Bear or Cat Form by 4%.
Increases your critical strike chance while in Bear or Cat Form by 6%.

Brutal Impact.name: Brutal Impact
descriptions: Increases the stun duration of your Bash and Pounce abilities by 1 sec.
Increases the stun duration of your Bash and Pounce abilities by 2 sec.

Primal Tenacity.name: Primal Tenacity
descriptions: Increases your chance to resist Stun and Fear effects by an additional 5% and reduces the cooldown of your Enrage ability by 10 sec.
Increases your chance to resist Stun and Fear effects by an additional 10% and reduces the cooldown of your Enrage ability by 20 sec.
Increases your chance to resist Stun and Fear effects by an additional 15% and reduces the cooldown of your Enrage ability by 30 sec.

Leader of the Pack.name: Leader of the Pack
descriptions:
Doubles the effects of your Bear and Cat Forms.

Also, while in Cat or Bear Form, the Leader of the Pack increases ranged and melee critical chance of all raid members within $24932a1 yards by $24932s1%.

Survival Instincts.name: Survival Instincts
descriptions: Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by 1%. In addition, your critical strikes restore 1% of your maximum health. This effect can only occur once every 3 sec.
Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by 2%. In addition, your critical strikes restore 2% of your maximum health. This effect can only occur once every 3 sec.
Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by 3%. In addition, your critical strikes restore 3% of your maximum health. This effect can only occur once every 3 sec.
Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by 4%. In addition, your critical strikes restore 4% of your maximum health. This effect can only occur once every 3 sec.
Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by 6%. In addition, your critical strikes restore 5% of your maximum health. This effect can only occur once every 3 sec.

Killer Instincts.name: Killer Instincts
descriptions: Increases all damage caused by 1%. In addition, your melee critical strikes will increase your attack speed by $16257s1% for your next $16257n attacks.
Increases all damage caused by 2%. In addition, your melee critical strikes will increase your attack speed by $16277s1% for your next $16277n attacks.
Increases all damage caused by 3%. In addition, your melee critical strikes will increase your attack speed by $16278s1% for your next $16278n attacks.
Increases all damage caused by 4%. In addition, your melee critical strikes will increase your attack speed by $16279s1% for your next $16279n attacks.
Increases all damage caused by 5%. In addition, your melee critical strikes will increase your attack speed by $16280s1% for your next $16280n attacks.

Untamed Heart.name: Untamed Heart
descriptions: Heal yourself for 20% of your maximum health, and increases your maximum health by 20% for 20 sec.

Predatory Strikes.name: Predatory Strikes
descriptions: Increases your melee attack power in Cat and Bear Forms by 100% of your level. Also, increases your Attack Rating skill by 4.
Increases your melee attack power in Cat and Bear Forms by 200% of your level. Also, increases your Attack Rating skill by 7.
Increases your melee attack power in Cat and Bear Forms by 300% of your level. Also, increases your Attack Rating skill by 10.

Savage Fury.name: Savage Fury
descriptions: Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Maul and Swipe abilities by 10%.
Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Maul and Swipe abilities by 20%.

Heart of the Wild.name: Heart of the Wild
descriptions: Increases your Intellect and Spirit by 6%. In addition, while in Bear Form your Stamina is increased by $/2;s1% and while in Cat Form your Strength is increased by $/2;s1%.
Increases your Intellect and Spirit by 12%. In addition, while in Bear Form your Stamina is increased by $/2;s1% and while in Cat Form your Strength is increased by $/2;s1%.
Increases your Intellect and Spirit by 18%. In addition, while in Bear Form your Stamina is increased by $/2;s1% and while in Cat Form your Strength is increased by $/2;s1%.
Increases your Intellect and Spirit by 24%. In addition, while in Bear Form your Stamina is increased by $/2;s1% and while in Cat Form your Strength is increased by $/2;s1%.
Increases your Intellect and Spirit by 30%. In addition, while in Bear Form your Stamina is increased by $/2;s1% and while in Cat Form your Strength is increased by $/2;s1%.

Stalking.name: Stalking
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Ravage and Shred abilities by 15%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Ravage and Shred abilities by 30%.

Feral Instinct.name: Feral Instinct
descriptions: Increases threat caused in Bear Form by 5%, reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling and increases the duration of your Tiger's Fury, Grizzly’s Fury and Challenging Roar abilities by 3 sec.

Increases threat caused in Bear Form by 10%, reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling and increases the duration of your Tiger's Fury, Grizzly’s Fury and Challenging Roar abilities by 6 sec.

Increases threat caused in Bear Form by 15%, reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling and increases the duration of your Tiger's Fury, Grizzly’s Fury and Challenging Roar abilities by 9 sec.

Thick Hide.name: Thick Hide
descriptions: Increases your Armor contribution from items by 5%.
Increases your Armor contribution from items by 10%.
Increases your Armor contribution from items by 15%.

Feral Aggression.name: Feral Aggression
descriptions: Increases the effectiveness of your Demoralizing Roar by 20% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite and Rip by 5%.
Increases the effectiveness of your Demoralizing Roar by 40% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite and Rip by 10%.

Ferocity.name: Ferocity
descriptions: Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by $/10;s1 Rage or Energy.
Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by $/10;s1 Rage or Energy.
Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by $/10;s1 Rage or Energy.
Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by $/10;s1 Rage or Energy.
Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by $/10;s1 Rage or Energy.
